column2:
Lila
Blanchard
is
the
secretary
of
the
YSA
board.
Outside
of
the
YSA
board,
Lila
is
also
the 
Richmond
site
manager
for
Rubicon
Programs
Inc.
column3:
1. What is Lila's role on the YSA board?
2. What is Lila's role outside of the YSA board?
column4:
1. Lila is the secretary of the YSA board.
2. Lila is also the Richmond site manager for Rubicon Programs Inc.

1. What is Saphonia Foster's role on the YSA board?

column2:

Giammarco
is
the

Outside

Accounting

Board.
column3:
1. What is Jonathann's role on the YSA board?
2. What is Jonathann's role outside of the YSA board?

1. Jonathann is the treasurer of the YSA board.
2. Jonathann is an inspection specialist at the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board.

column2:
Allen
Ratliff
is
a
member
of
the
YSA
board.
Outside
of
the
YSA
board,
Allen
has
a
master’s 
degree
in
social
work,
is
a
licensed
clinical
social
worker,
and
is
a
doctoral
candidate
for
the 
School
of
Public
Health
at
UC
Berkeley
column3:
1. What is Allen Ratliff's role on the YSA board?
2. What is Allen Ratliff's role outside of the YSA board?
3. What is Allen Ratliff’s educational background?
column4:
1. Allen Ratliff is a member of the YSA board.
2. Allen Ratliff is a doctoral candidate for the School of Public Health at UC Berkeley.
3. Allen Ratliff has a master’s degree in social work and is a licensed clinical social worker

1. What is John's role on the YSA board?
2. What is John's role outside of the YSA board?

2. John is also the audit manager at KPMG LLP.
